apple_vendor_description: This beautiful emoji on Apple devices illustrates a couple united by a floating heart, with one person depicted in a light skin tone and the other in a medium-dark skin tone, highlighting Apple's dedication to diverse representation. The soft, glowing heart, rendered with Apple's signature glossy finish and gentle gradients, symbolizes love, connection, and partnership. The figures are drawn with smooth, rounded edges, conveying warmth and affection, making this emoji an excellent way to celebrate relationships and express deep bonds on Apple devices.
